casebody.data:
COUNTY OF DURHAM
v.
AREC 3, LLC, et al. No. 427P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2007. Curtis Massey, for Worth L. Hill, Sheriff. Richard Bydee, for AREC 3, LLC. Marie Inserra, for County of Durham. Richard Weintraub, for City of Durham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of September 2007 by Defendant (AREC 3, LLC) for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Prohibition, Petition for Writ of Certiorari and Petition for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2007."
